scripts.start: node prisma/schema-selector.js && prisma generate && node prisma/startup.js && NODE_PATH=/app/node_modules:/app/apps/backend/node_modules node dist/index.js
scripts.start:prod: node prisma/schema-selector.js && prisma generate && prisma migrate deploy && NODE_PATH=/app/node_modules:/app/apps/backend/node_modules node dist/index.js
scripts.start:dev: node prisma/schema-selector.js && prisma generate && prisma db push --accept-data-loss --skip-generate && NODE_PATH=/app/node_modules:/app/apps/backend/node_modules node dist/index.js
scripts.pretest: set DATABASE_URL=file:./test.db && node prisma/schema-selector.js && prisma db push --accept-data-loss --skip-generate
scripts.debug:documents: node prisma/schema-selector.js && prisma generate && ts-node --project scripts/tsconfig.json scripts/debug-documents.ts
scripts.generate-admin-token: node prisma/schema-selector.js && prisma generate && ts-node --project scripts/tsconfig.json scripts/generate-admin-token.ts
